messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Star party
messages.msgSnippet: We will be watching here in Nevada, my children , hubby and I.  My daughter (8) is really looking forward to it.  Hope the night is clear! Shoshana ... From:
messages.messageBody:
We will be watching here in Nevada, my children , hubby and I. My daughter
(8) is really looking forward to it. Hope the night is clear!
Shoshana
----- Original Message -----
From: "Julie Stauffer" <jnjstau@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 12, 2002 10:41 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Star party


> Anybody else going to be watching the Leonid Showers on the 18th?
>
> We are camping out with a bunch of homeschoolers and setting the alarm for
> 4:00 (peak activity time).
> We plan on drinking hot chocolate all night and then having a big
breakfast
> in the morning.
>
> Dh is staying home with our little ones so he won't be too wore out for
> work. I'm taking the 3 bigger ones and we will be home before dh leaves
for
> work. The kids are really looking forward to it.
>
> Julie
>

messages.subject: Star party
messages.msgSnippet: Anybody else going to be watching the Leonid Showers on the 18th? We are camping out with a bunch of homeschoolers and setting the alarm for 4:00 (peak
messages.messageBody:
Anybody else going to be watching the Leonid Showers on the 18th?

We are camping out with a bunch of homeschoolers and setting the alarm for
4:00 (peak activity time).
We plan on drinking hot chocolate all night and then having a big breakfast
in the morning.

Dh is staying home with our little ones so he won't be too wore out for
work. I'm taking the 3 bigger ones and we will be home before dh leaves for
work. The kids are really looking forward to it.

Julie
